hellloo: is there a website that will tell you all the domains registered with a given registrar?
no you dont know of one or no there definitely isnt one
because registrars don't provide that information
sure, and TLD owners can probably tell you which domains in that TLD a registrar has. They don't though and you'd still need to collect it from all TLD's
what do you mean collect from the TLDs
isnt a TLD just the extension like .com .org
whois querys the TLD owner to get registrar information. These TLD owners will tell you "given domain X, this is the info" they won't give you "Given registrar Y, these are all registerered comains"
yes, it's the TLD is the extension. Each TLD is owned/managed by a single entity. E.g. verisign manages .com
gotcha .. do u think whois.com pays those entities to do the queries?

they don't seem to charge for whois lookups, just for registration
